trends: there has been one other sighting in cms\tg
there were no other sightings in cms\tg on or around november 23rd 2008
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were traveling north on i-77 at approximately 0300. we both noticed a bright green light in the sky that looked like a flare. we both agreed it wasn't a flare and watched it for a few more seconds before it just disappeared. when we got on our flight later that morning we met an old woman who had heard about these green lights all over ther world. i looked into it a little and it sounds like it was a simple meteor but you never know. i was hoping ot find someone who had their camera at the ready and took a photo or a video. [cms\tg\pid]
Summary: Green light streaking across the night sky.
